titleInfo.title: APPOINTMENT OF CONFEREES ON H.R. 1, TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT

extension.searchTitle: APPOINTMENT OF CONFEREES ON H.R. 1, TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 197

congVote.result: So the motion was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act_Motion to go to Conference
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to disagree to the Senate amendment and request a conference on H.R. 1, to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018, by a yea-and-nay vote of 222 yeas to 192 nays, Roll No. 653.

congVote.result: So the motion to instruct was rejected.
